name: Ozyegin University
about: Özyeğin University Flight School, located in Istanbul, Turkey, is a premier institution for aviation education. It offers a comprehensive Undergraduate Professional Flight Program in collaboration with AYJET Approved Training Organization since 2012-2013. The program includes English language education, academic courses, and flight training leading to a Private Pilot License and Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL). With a focus on national and international standards, the school equips students with the skills and knowledge required by the aviation industry. The faculty and facilities are cutting-edge, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for successful careers in aviation. Özyeğin University is committed to developing innovative leaders in the aviation field, and its graduates have gone on to fly for major airline companies. The university's scenic campus and supportive international student environment make it an ideal choice for aspiring pilots.
